definitions.definition: Any of a group of flowering plants in several genera of the taxonomic family Malvaceae , especially of the genus Malva . Several species are edible by humans.
Larentia clavaria , an uncommon moth found across Eurasia.

main_definition: Any of a group of flowering plants in several genera of the taxonomic family Malvaceae , especially of the genus Malva . Several species are edible by humans.
